snippet.title: Peril by MDE (by Daniel Thurman) - iOS/Android/Steam - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Subscribe for daily content:  https://goo.gl/5ybthp

Peril by MDE  by Daniel Thurman (iOS/Android/Steam)

Peril is an action adventure 2d platformer created using Unreal Engine 4. In this game the main character must battle through various worlds and defeat many enemies, all the while using a javelin as both a weapon and a tool to reach new places.

Appstore:

https://apps.apple.com/us/app/peril-by-mde/id1614152147?platform=iphone

Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.MonsterDoctorEntertainment.Peril

Steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1798910/Peril/

Facebook:

TBA

Homepage:

TBA

Twitter:

https://twitter.com/Peril2d

Our contacts:

mail: promocode@touchgameplay.com
twitter: https://twitter.com/touchgameplay
Facebook: Touchgameplay
Discord: https://discord.gg/2ptNhxH

#PerilbyMDE #Peril #DanielThurman #MonsterDoctorEntertainment  #TouchGameplay
